pages.title: Reaching Level 70
pages.text: Reaching Level 70 requires a Level 60 Enchanting Table and access to Deepslate.

pages.title: Reaching Level 70
pages.text: Once you've crafted a $(9)Dormant Deepshelf$(), you need to infuse it.$(p)This infusion recipe will require some extra blocks to reach the stat threshold.$(p)Completing the infusion will yield a $(9)Deepshelf$(), which can get you to Level 70.

pages.title: Reaching Level 75
pages.text: To hit level 75, you will need to upgrade your Deepshelves.$(p)Doing this requires materials only found in the $(9)Deep Dark$().$(p)$(9)Echo Shards$() may be looted from the Ancient City, and $(9)Sculk$() may be collected with Silk Touch.

pages.title: Reaching Level 80
pages.text: The last step to Level 80 requires slaying the $(9)Warden$(), which allows crafting $(9)Sculkshelves$().
